activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6637
activity.text: You instructed me to reuse the existing type, but it lacks the required types for comments. Additionally, you mentioned reusing the ReadMore.tsx component, but when I attempt to do so, it doesn't align with the Comment Box. Modifying the CSS of the ReadMore component might disrupt the UI of other components, so I opted to write new code to address this issue.
